title: Crew Show!
description: Recorded on many people's favorite holiday; Patriot's Day (April 20th) we sat down at the podcast table for the first time in a couple weeks.  Matt is fresh back from Germany on the /Drive NBC shoot.  While there he got some hands on time with the Mercedes C63 S and he has tails from general insanity at Bilderberg and the Nurburgring.  Halfway through recording Jeff Glucker from Hooniverse joins us at the table and we discuss the Audi S3 vs Golf R and how they may stack up against the Focus RS.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
